oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Main Street with Bank of Commerce
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Main Street, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image with Bank of Commerce visible, automobiles, trolley lines, people.

“Looking north on Main Street, from the corner of Monroe Avenue. The Bank of Commerce Building is in the foreground to the right, with Columbian Mutual Tower, the city’s tallest skyscraper, in the distance.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Main Street; Monroe Avenue; downtown; Bank of Commerce; banks; businesses;
